SEARCH
Package Entity

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
Entity.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Movie extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an instance of a movie used in the system.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(int id, String Title, String Description, Constants.AGE_CLASSIFICATION AgeRating, ArrayList<String> actorList, ArrayList<String> directorList, ArrayList<String> genreList, ArrayList<Review_Ratings> reviewList, LocalDate OpeningDate, LocalDate ClosingDate, Duration MovieDuration)
      Constructor for the Movie class, with additional parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the movie
      Title - title of the movie
      Description - description of the movie
      AgeRating - age rating of the movie
      actorList - list of actors in the movie
      directorList - list of directors who worked on the movie
      genreList - list of genres that the movie falls into
      reviewList - list of reviews and ratings that the movie have
      OpeningDate - Opening date of the movie
      ClosingDate - closing date of the movie
      MovieDuration - how long the movie lasts in minutes???

    • removeActor

      public void removeActor(String actor)
      This method removes an actor from the actorList Firstly it does a search on the current actorList to find if they exist in the list If they do, they will be removed from the actorList. Else, the method terminates.
      Parameters:
      actor - is the actor to remove.

    • getDirectors

      public ArrayList<String> getDirectors()
      This method returns the list of directors of the movie
      Returns:
      the director list of the movie

    • setDirector

      public void setDirector(ArrayList<String> directorList)
      This method sets a list of directors for the movie
      Parameters:
      directorList - is the new list of directors for the movie

    • addDirector

      public void addDirector(String Director)
      This method adds a new director to the directorList Firstly it does a search on the current directorList to find if they exist in the list If they do, the method will terminate. Else, the actor is added into actorList.
      Parameters:
      Director - is the new Director to be added.

    • removeDirector

      public void removeDirector(String Director)
      This method removes a director from the directorList Firstly it does a search on the current directorList to find if they exist in the list If they do, the director will be removed. Else, the method will terminate.
      Parameters:
      Director - is the director to be removed

    • addGenre

      public void addGenre(String genre)
      This method adds a new genre to the genreList Firstly it does a search on the current genreList to find if they exist in the list If they do, the method will terminate. Else, the actor is added into actorList.
      Parameters:
      genre - is the new genre to be added.

    • removeGenre

      public void removeGenre(String genre)
      This method adds a new genre to the genreList Firstly it does a search on the current genreList to find if they exist in the list If they do, the method will terminate. Else, the actor is added into actorList.
      Parameters:
      genre - is the new genre to be added.
